CustomField.description: Checks how many days have passed since the Implementation Start Date. Case 17359752 Modified to exclude weekends and stop calculating when Launch Date is filled in Case #30680668
CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(Training_Completed__c),
(today() - Implementation_Start_Date__c - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Implementation_Start_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(Training_Completed__c- Implementation_Start_Date__c - 2*( floor((Training_Completed__c- DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((Implementation_Start_Date__c - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Number of days that have passed since the Implementation Start Date
CustomField.label: Implementation Age
